metadata.title: CVE-2023-0704 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in DevTools in Google Chrome prior to110.0.5481.77 allowed a remote attacker to bypass same origin policy andproxy settings via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
